attributes.title: Top 10 Let's Plays of 2014
attributes.caption: 2014 Let's Plays Edition
attributes.description: It's that time! So let's take a look at our favorite Let's Plays from 2014!

attributes.title: Ryan Haywood's Top 5 Favorite Games
attributes.caption: Ryan's Favorite Games Edition
attributes.description: Geoff, Ray, and Ryan take a look at Ryan's Top 5 Favorite Video Games!

attributes.title: Top 10 Swords in Video Games
attributes.caption: Sword Edition
attributes.description: Geoff, Ray, and Michael take a look at the Top 10 Swords in Video Games!

attributes.title: Top 5 Weakest Enemies in Video Games
attributes.caption: Weakest Enemies Edition
attributes.description: Ray, Geoff, and Michael take a look at the Top 5 Weakest Enemies in Video Games!
attributes.display_title: Top 5 Weakest Enemies in Video Games

attributes.title: Top 5 Collectathon Video Games
attributes.caption: Assassin's Creed Series, Banjo Tooie, Crackdown 2, Metroid Series, and Donkey Kong 64
attributes.description: Kdin takes us on a trip through the Top 5 Collectathon Video Games! He covers the Assassin's Creed Series, Banjo Tooie, Crackdown 2, Metroid Series, and Donkey Kong 64.

attributes.title: Lindsay's Top 10 Favorite Video Games
attributes.caption: Lindsay's Favs
attributes.description: Lindsay shares with us her favorite games of all time!

attributes.title: Top 5 Cats In Video Games
attributes.caption: Meow Edition
attributes.description: Kdin finds the fantastic feline favorites in video games!

attributes.title: Top 5 Dogs in Video Games
attributes.caption: Woof, Woof Edition
attributes.description: Last week Kdin asked you, the community, for your favorite dogs in video games...and here's your list!

attributes.title: Top 5 Games from 2005
attributes.description: Kdin, Jeremy, and a drunk Geoff and Michael take a look at the Top 5 games from 2005 which Geoff doesn't remember making with Kdin last week, in fact I'm pretty sure he doesn't remember what he had for breakfast this morning anymore

attributes.title: Top 5 Crossover Game Series
attributes.caption: Crossover Games Edition
attributes.description: Kdin takes a look at the Top 5 Crossover Video Game series, however none of these compare to Abbott and Costello Meet Frankenstein.

attributes.title: Caleb Denecour's Top 5 Games
attributes.description: Kdin and Caleb take a look at Caleb's Top 5 favorite video games, to our surprise, there were no video games about Ultimate Frisbee on the list.

attributes.title: Top 5 Easy 1000 Gamerscore Games
attributes.description: Ray, Kdin, and Geoff take a look at 5 games that will be sure to give you an easy 1000 Gamerscore!

attributes.title: Top 5 Games With Cameras
attributes.description: Geoff and Kdin take a look at the best games that feature cameras! And we also learn that Frank West followed in Geoff's footsteps. Geoff covered wars you know.

attributes.title: Top 5 Easy 1000 Gamerscore Games - Part 2
attributes.description: Geoff, Kdin, and Ray embark on the never ending quest to find video games with easy gamerscore! Welcome to Part 2 everybody!

attributes.title: Top 5 Birds in Video Games
attributes.description: Kdin and Geoff talk about the Top 5 Birds in video games while Matt continues to talk even though he unplugged his mic accidentally just before the recording began!

attributes.title: Top 5 Easy 1000 Gamerscore Games - Part 3
attributes.description: Kdin, Geoff, and Matt (now with working microphone) bring you five more games with an easy 1000GS! That's 15,000GS so far!

attributes.title: Top 5 Best DLC in Video Games
attributes.description: Geoff and Kdin take a look at the "Best DLC" in video games!
attributes.display_title: Top 5 Best DLC in Video Games

attributes.title: Top 5 Easy Arcade Completions
attributes.description: Kdin and Geoff take a look at 5 super-simple, super-quick, super-fun easy arcade completions! Enjoy the extra 1600 Gamerscore!

attributes.title: Top 5 Lego Games
attributes.description: Kdin, Geoff, and surprise guest Michael take a look at the Top 5 Lego games!

attributes.title: Top 5 Ground Pounds in Video Games
attributes.description: Kdin and Geoff take a look at the most destructive ground pounds in video games!
attributes.display_title: Top 5 Ground Pounds in Video Games

attributes.title: Top 5 Video Games from 1995
attributes.caption: What were your favs from '95?
attributes.description: Kdin and Matt attempt to list the Top 5 Games from 1995 while Trevor and Jeremy do their best to stop them.

attributes.title: Top 5 - Dinosaur Games
attributes.description: Kdin and Jeremy take a look at some of the best games featuring dino dna!

attributes.title: Top 5 Most Destructive Weapons In Fallout 3
attributes.description: To prepare themselves for Fallout 4, Kdin and Jeremy take a look at the Top 5 most destructive weapons in Fallout 3!
attributes.display_title: Top 5 Most Destructive Weapons In Fallout 3

attributes.title: Top 5 Easy 1000 Gamerscore Games Part 4
attributes.description: Kdin, Matt, and Jeremy take a look at five more games where you can get some super easy Gamerscore!

attributes.title: Top 5 Rivalries in Video Games
attributes.description: Kdin and Michael take a break from their intense hatred of one another to look at the most bitter rivalries in all of video games!

attributes.title: Top 5 Xbox 360 Games You Never Played
attributes.description: Kdin, Geoff, and Michael show off some really amazing Xbox 360 games you probably overlooked!
attributes.display_title: Top 5 Xbox 360 Games You Never Played

attributes.title: Top 5 Most Expensive Games
attributes.description: Geoff, Ryan, and Trevor take a look at the Top 5 most expensive video games to develop. Ignore inflation. It's just a myth anyway.

attributes.title: Top 5 Video Game Hospitals
attributes.caption: Geoff and a fresh out of the hospital Kdin take a look at some famous fictitious healing facilities!
attributes.description: Geoff and a fresh out of the hospital Kdin take a look at some famous fictitious healing facilities!

attributes.title: Top 5 Big Boss Falls In MGSV
attributes.caption: Geoff and Ryan take a moment to appreciate Big Boss' glorious incoordination after being in a coma for nine years.
attributes.description: Geoff and Ryan take a moment to appreciate Big Boss' glorious incoordination after being in a coma for nine years.
attributes.display_title: Top 5 Big Boss Falls In MGSV

attributes.title: Top 10 Xbox One Games
attributes.caption: Geoff, Michael, and Ryan take a look at the "Top 10 Xbox One Games Currently Available According To Achievement Hunter"*!
attributes.description: Geoff, Michael, and Ryan take a look at the "Top 10 Xbox One Games Currently Available According To Achievement Hunter"*!*I take no personal responsibility for these numberings. - Love, Kdin.

attributes.title: Top 5 Scary Games of 2015
attributes.caption: A look back into what games made us (mostly Geoff) scream in 2015!
attributes.description: A look back into what games made us (mostly Geoff) scream in 2015!
